name: DEAD PLAGUE: Zombie Survival
description:
A zombie virus leaked from a secret research facility. Tropical climate helped the infection to quickly spread across the world. More and more people are turning into blood-thirsty walking dead. The menace of a global zombie apocalypse is looming over the mankind.

BIOCORP leads the battle against the zombie plague. You have been assigned to a DNA sampling group that conducts reconnaissance of contagion centers. There is hope that this data will help create a vaccine against the zombie virus.
Act quickly and resolutely to save the mankind in this 3D zombie shooter!

Features:
• Male and female characters (each with a unique skills).
• The game can be completed in a single- or multi-player campaign with unique quests, missions and battles with Zombie BOSSES.
• Up to 4 players in the online co-op mode! Play with your friends!
• 6 players in the online PVP Mode!
• Massive arsenal to choose from and multiple combat skills.
• Additional equipment: mines, frag and stun grenades, adrenaline shots.
• Various zombie types with unique behavior and skills.
• Realistic lighting and weather effects, stunning HD graphics!
• Twin Stick Shooter controls optimized for phones and tablets.
• Localizations: English, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, French, Russian, Japanese, Korean and Chinese.
• No additional downloads after the game is installed!

Destroy the walking dead to save the human kind from a zombie apocalypse!
